result.eng: The translator should not only read the text carefully but do a bit of research as well.

result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: The soup should be ready for the lunchtime rush.

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ga: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.

result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis

result.eng: You should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ga: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.orig: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích

result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ a ḟios agat naċ só ar biṫ atá i ndán duit ar an ċoigríċYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é

result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
